title: 10Rule速 and CloudMills partner to create a World-Class Workforce Performance Solutions System
text:
Submitted by admin on 10/2/2015 @ 11:30 AM Companies mentioned in this article: 10Rule 
SANTA BARBARA, Calif., Oct. 2, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- 10Rule Human Capital Performance Solutions Workforce Performance Transformation Cloud (HCPS) has announced their partnership with CloudMills to host and present client data inside the leading Human Capital Management (HCM) business application. 
Logo - http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnh/20151002/273468LOGO 
The partnership gives 10Rule immediate access to CloudMills 80+ Connectors including those for SAP SuccessFactors, Ultimate Software, Workday, Taleo, Ceridian, Lawson, Oracle, Salesforce.com, and others. 
The relentless search for accessible, innovative cloud-based applications to accelerate and manage Human Capital Performance Systems continues to grow at a record pace. Pioneering strategic business users can now drive their talent performance by using 10Rule's patented cloud performance capabilities to sustainably replicate the top 10% performance levels that drive greater bottom line results - via measuring, benching, hiring and developing talent. 10Rule速 (HCPS) is a simple plug-in (API) capable of changing HR into a productivity improvement center. 
"The CloudMills partnership brings a high level of quality, rigor, and speed to the integrations our clients need to enable workforce intelligence," explains Bob Morlot, CSO of 10Rule. "It also keeps our technical resources focused on Human Capital performance predictive analytics rather than creating interfaces each time for client HCM systems." 
While many of the cloud-based vendors offer robust application program interfaces (APIs), the time and skill set required to build and maintain the integrations can put an excess load on a client's already stretched IT department. 
10Rule's (HCPS) Human Capital Performance solutions platform transforms Cloud HCM Data into hyper driven Workforce Performance intelligence. It can automate and integrate talent productivity measurement with best practice employee development solutions. CloudMills API capabilities become a quintessential source for plugging in 10Rule's performance solutions that can integrate into a client's HCM platform. 
"It is exciting to see a company like 10Rule taking steps beyond the competition and actually assisting clients in setting their data free", Dianna Sheppard, CEO of CloudMills said. "Too often, companies simply hand their clients an API and 'hope' they get the automation and synchronization done. That's the lie of APIs; it's like handing someone a menu with no kitchen to prepare, cook and serve it. 10Rule gets that and solves it. 
About CloudMills CloudMills is a service delivery solution focused solely on Human Capital Management. With the CloudMills platform the enterprise can achieve the strength of ERP integration along with the high-value functionality found in best of breed solutions. Powered by a unique service architecture, CloudMills increasingly drives analytics, business processes, and strategic dashboards to benefit organizations -- visit www.cloudmills.com . 
About 10Rule Workforce Performance Transformation Suite unleashes the power and potential of any organization's global talent. At its core is a scientific performance diagnostic metric that is imbedded to drive the organization's 10Rule strategy with its "smart" solutions. 10Rule's enterprise software solution suite helps global organizations increase workforce performance by sustainably replicating the top 10% performers through measuring, benching, hiring, developing and auditing all talent productivity and its impact on bottom line results. 10Rule suite provides advanced HR analytics, high-value HR Big Data and delivers high performance talent development tools and solutions. Visit www.10Rule.com for more information and client case studies.
